etymology.description: Ideogrammic compound (會意): 甘 + 匹.
etymology.interpretation: Combines 甘 “sweet; pleasant” with 匹 “to match; pair,” suggesting a comparison or matching that intensifies a quality. From the idea of exceeding or matching sweetness came the sense of strong degree, yielding adverbial meanings like “very; extremely.”

examples.chinese: 今天天气甚好(今天天氣甚好)。
examples.english: The weather is very good today.

examples.chinese: 我对这部电影甚为满意(我對這部電影甚為滿意)。
examples.pinyin: Wǒ duì zhè bù diànyǐng shèn wéi mǎnyì.
examples.english: I am very satisfied with this movie.

examples.chinese: 他走得甚远(他走得甚遠)。
